name: Early Stage Basal Cell Carcinoma
chief_complaint: I have a shiny, pearly bump on my nose that won't go away and sometimes bleeds
physical_findings: 4mm raised, pearly nodule on nasal bridge
small telangiectasias visible on lesion surface

lab_results.skin biopsy: confirmed basal cell carcinoma, superficial type

prognosis: excellent with early detection and complete removal; 98% cure rate
description: A common, slow-growing skin cancer that typically appears on sun-exposed areas. Usually non-aggressive and rarely metastasizes.
